description.value:
Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud. If your next action is to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell] that targets you, you surround yourself in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] of dense magical mist that lasts until the start of your next turn.

All creatures within the cloud become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed], and all creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it.
